english: How much does this cost?
Can I try this on?
Do you have this in a different size?
Where is the fitting room?
Is this on sale?
Can I return this if it doesn't fit?
arabic: هل يمكنني إرجاع هذا إذا لم يكن مناسبًا؟

english: What are your store hours?
Where can I find the electronics section?
arabic: أين يمكنني العثور على قسم الإلكترونيات؟

english: Do you accept credit cards?
Can I get a receipt, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على إيصال من فضلك؟

english: Is there a discount on this item?
arabic: هل هناك خصم على هذا العنصر؟

english: Where is the checkout counter?
Can I get this gift-wrapped?
Do you have a loyalty program?
Can I pay with cash?
Can I get the bill, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على الفاتورة من فضلك؟

english: I would like to make a reservation.
Do you have a table for two?
Can I see the menu, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني رؤية القائمة من فضلك؟

english: What are today's specials?
I would like to order the steak.
Can I have this without onions?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على هذا بدون بصل؟

english: What do you recommend?
Is there a vegetarian option?
Can I get a glass of water?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على كوب من الماء؟

english: Do you have any desserts?
Can I have the check, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على الفاتورة من فضلك؟

english: Is service included?
Can I pay by card?
Do you have any vegan dishes?
I have a food allergy.
Can I get this to go?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على هذا كوجبة جاهزة؟

english: Is there a kids' menu?
Can I have more napkins, please?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على المزيد من المناديل من فضلك؟

english: Do you have any gluten-free options?
arabic: هل لديكم أي خيارات خالية من الغلوتين؟

english: Can I speak to the manager?
Is there a smoking area?
Can I get a doggy bag?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على كيس للكلاب؟

english: Do you offer free refills?
Can I have the wine list?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على قائمة النبيذ؟

english: Is there a restroom?
